str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: From a compound of the base of homou and logos; to assent, i.e. Covenant, acknowledge.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To go away, depart, withdraw. From apo and choreo; to go away.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Vocative Masculine Plural
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.
Lawlessness, iniquity, disobedience, sin. From anomos; illegality, i.e. Violation of law or wickedness.
